name: Ricardo C. Farias
content: Personal Page of Ricardo Farias Associate Professor Federal University of Rio de Janeiro - UFRJ System and Computer Engineering Program - PESC Center of Technology, Block H, Room H319 Cidade Universitaria, Rio de Janeiro, Zip 21941-972, Brazil Phone: +55 21 2562-8647 Fax: +55 21 2562-8676 Ph.D. in Computer Graphics at State University of New York at Stony Brook MS. in Image Processing and Computer Graphics at Graduate Program in System and Computer Engineering / UFRJ BS. in Physics at Physics Department of Fluminense Federal University Research Interests Computer Vision Image Processing Computer Graphics Scientific Visualization High Performance Computing Hybrid Computing (CPU/GPU/Cell) Distributed and Parallel Computing Courses Taught Graduate Undergraduate Students Publications email: rfarias@cos.ufrj.br Curriculum Lattes: http://lattes.cnpq.br/9063837162469343
